The Institute for Computer-Aided Reasoning in Mathematics invites applications for a postdoctoral fellowship beginning August 2026. A Ph.D. in mathematics or a closely related discipline is required. We seek strong researchers with demonstrated experience using one or more of the technologies above and an interest in supporting the institute’s mission. The term is one year, renewable.

Applicants should submit their cover letter, research statement, CV, and list of references to positions@icarm.io. Applications will be considered until the position is filled.

https://icarm.io/positions/
https://www.mathjobs.org/jobs/list/27988
